scripts.deploy: vite build && current_version=$(grep '"version"' package.json | awk -F: '{gsub(/[", ]/, "", $2); print $2}') && new_version=$(echo $current_version | awk -F. '{$NF = $NF + 1;} 1' OFS=.) && jq --arg new_version "$new_version" '.version |= $new_version' package.json > tmp_package.json && mv tmp_package.json package.json && git add . && git commit -m "Deploy $new_version" && git push origin master
